description: Comprehensive gold standard dataset for variant actionability assessment - includes SNVs, indels, fusions, and CNVs across multiple tumor types

entries.notes: FDA-approved BRAF inhibitors (vemurafenib, dabrafenib, encorafenib)
references: Chapman PB et al. N Engl J Med 2011

entries.notes: FDA-approved combination therapy with encorafenib + cetuximab
references: Kopetz S et al. N Engl J Med 2019

entries.notes: BRAF inhibitors show activity but not first-line therapy
references: Planchard D et al. Lancet Oncol 2016

entries.notes: FDA-approved EGFR TKIs (erlotinib, gefitinib, afatinib, osimertinib)
references: Rosell R et al. Lancet Oncol 2012

entries.notes: FDA-approved EGFR TKIs with strong response rates
references: Mok TS et al. N Engl J Med 2009

entries.notes: Resistance to first/second-gen TKIs, sensitive to osimertinib
references: Mok TS et al. N Engl J Med 2017

entries.notes: FDA-approved KRAS G12C inhibitors (sotorasib, adagrasib)
references: Skoulidis F et al. N Engl J Med 2021

entries.notes: Predicts resistance to anti-EGFR therapy (cetuximab, panitumumab)
references: Lievre A et al. Cancer Res 2006

entries.notes: Common driver mutation but no approved targeted therapy for pancreatic
references: Waters AM et al. Cold Spring Harb Perspect Med 2018

entries.notes: FDA-approved HER2-targeted therapies (trastuzumab, pertuzumab, T-DM1, T-DXd)
references: Slamon DJ et al. N Engl J Med 2001

entries.notes: FDA-approved trastuzumab for HER2+ gastric cancer
references: Bang YJ et al. Lancet 2010

entries.notes: Trastuzumab shows activity in trials but not FDA-approved
references: Sartore-Bianchi A et al. Cancer Discov 2018

entries.notes: Resistance to imatinib, FDA-approved avapritinib for advanced GIST
references: Heinrich MC et al. J Clin Oncol 2020

entries.notes: FDA-approved imatinib for KIT-mutant GIST
references: Demetri GD et al. N Engl J Med 2002

entries.notes: FDA-approved ALK inhibitors (crizotinib, alectinib, ceritinib, brigatinib)
references: Solomon BJ et al. N Engl J Med 2014

entries.notes: FDA-approved crizotinib for ALK+ ALCL
references: Gambacorti-Passerini C et al. Blood 2011

entries.notes: FDA-approved ROS1 inhibitors (crizotinib, entrectinib)
references: Shaw AT et al. N Engl J Med 2014

entries.notes: FDA-approved selpercatinib and pralsetinib
references: Drilon A et al. N Engl J Med 2020

entries.notes: FDA-approved selpercatinib for RET fusion-positive thyroid
references: Wirth LJ et al. N Engl J Med 2020

entries.notes: Tumor-agnostic FDA approval for larotrectinib and entrectinib
references: Drilon A et al. N Engl J Med 2018

entries.notes: Tumor-agnostic FDA approval for NTRK fusions
references: Doebele RC et al. Lancet Oncol 2020

entries.notes: FDA-approved pemigatinib and infigratinib
references: Abou-Alfa GK et al. Lancet Oncol 2020

entries.notes: FDA-approved erdafitinib for FGFR-altered urothelial cancer
references: Loriot Y et al. Lancet Oncol 2019

entries.notes: FDA-approved capmatinib and tepotinib
references: Wolf J et al. N Engl J Med 2020

entries.notes: Emerging target, clinical trials ongoing
references: Camidge DR et al. Lancet Oncol 2021

entries.notes: FDA-approved alpelisib for PIK3CA-mutant HR+/HER2- breast cancer
references: Andre F et al. N Engl J Med 2019

entries.notes: FDA-approved alpelisib for PIK3CA-mutant HR+/HER2- breast cancer
references: Andre F et al. N Engl J Med 2019

entries.notes: FDA-approved PARP inhibitors (olaparib, rucaparib, niraparib)
references: Moore K et al. N Engl J Med 2018

entries.notes: FDA-approved PARP inhibitors and platinum chemotherapy
references: de Bono J et al. N Engl J Med 2020

entries.notes: FDA-approved PARP inhibitors for germline BRCA-mutant breast
references: Robson M et al. N Engl J Med 2017

entries.notes: FDA-approved ivosidenib for IDH1-mutant AML
references: DiNardo CD et al. N Engl J Med 2018

entries.notes: FDA-approved enasidenib for IDH2-mutant AML
references: Stein EM et al. Blood 2017

entries.notes: Vorasidenib shows activity in phase 3 trial but not yet FDA-approved
references: Mellinghoff IK et al. N Engl J Med 2023

entries.notes: No approved targeted therapies; MEK inhibitors show some activity
references: Ascierto PA et al. Lancet Oncol 2013

entries.notes: Driver mutation but no specific approved therapy
references: Agrawal N et al. Cell 2014

entries.notes: Prognostic marker but no approved targeted therapy
references: Olivier M et al. Cold Spring Harb Perspect Biol 2010

entries.notes: Common hotspot mutation but no actionable therapy
references: Muller PA et al. Nat Rev Cancer 2013

entries.notes: Driver mutation but no direct therapeutic implications
references: Cancer Genome Atlas Network. Nature 2012

entries.notes: Predicts response to angiogenesis inhibitors
references: Sato Y et al. Cancer Res 2013

entries.notes: Prognostic significance but no targeted therapy
references: Shain AH et al. N Engl J Med 2015

entries.notes: Associated with immunotherapy resistance but no approved therapy
references: Skoulidis F et al. Cancer Discov 2018

entries.notes: Common alteration but limited therapeutic options
references: Cancer Genome Atlas Research Network. Nature 2013

entries.notes: May predict MEK inhibitor response but not established
references: Nissan MH et al. Cancer Discov 2014

entries.notes: Tumor-agnostic FDA approval for pembrolizumab/nivolumab
references: Le DT et al. N Engl J Med 2015

entries.notes: Associated with immunotherapy response but not absolute predictor
references: Yarchoan M et al. N Engl J Med 2017
